datasets.name: sea-ad_cohort_donor_metadata_072524.xlsx
datasets.description: Dataset containing demographic, clinical, and neuropathological data from donors, focusing on Alzheimer's disease (AD) and related conditions.

raw.name: Donor ID
raw.description: Unique identifier assigned to each donor.

raw.name: Primary Study Name
raw.description: Primary study associated with the donor (e.g., ACT, ADRC Clinical Core).

raw.name: Secondary Study Name
raw.description: Secondary study associated with the donor, if applicable.

raw.name: Age at Death
raw.description: Age of the donor at the time of death, in years.

raw.name: Sex
raw.description: Biological sex of the donor (Male or Female).

raw.name: Race (choice=White)
raw.description: Indicates if the donor's race is White (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Race (choice=Black/ African American)
raw.description: Indicates if the donor's race is Black or African American (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Race (choice=Asian)
raw.description: Indicates if the donor's race is Asian (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Race (choice=American Indian/ Alaska Native)
raw.description: Indicates if the donor's race is American Indian or Alaska Native (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Race (choice=Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander)
raw.description: Indicates if the donor's race is Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Race (choice=Unknown or unreported)
raw.description: Indicates if the donor's race is unknown or unreported (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Race (choice=Other)
raw.description: Indicates if the donor's race is categorized as Other (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: specify other race
raw.description: Text specifying the race if 'Other' is checked (e.g., Mixed).

raw.name: Hispanic/Latino
raw.description: Indicates if the donor identifies as Hispanic or Latino (Yes, No, or Unknown).

raw.name: Highest level of education
raw.description: Highest educational attainment of the donor (e.g., High School, Bachelors, Graduate).

raw.name: Years of education
raw.description: Total years of formal education completed by the donor.

raw.name: APOE Genotype
raw.description: APOE gene variant of the donor (e.g., 3/3, 3/4), a genetic risk factor for AD.

raw.name: Cognitive Status
raw.description: Cognitive status at last assessment (e.g., No dementia, Dementia).

raw.name: Age of onset cognitive symptoms
raw.description: Age when cognitive symptoms first appeared, if applicable.

raw.name: Age of Dementia diagnosis
raw.description: Age at which dementia was diagnosed, if applicable.

raw.name: Known head injury
raw.description: Indicates if the donor had a documented head injury (Yes, No, or Unknown).

raw.name: Have they had neuroimaging
raw.description: Indicates if neuroimaging was performed (Yes, No, or Unknown).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Alzheimers disease)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis includes Alzheimer's disease (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Alzheimers Possible/ Probable)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis includes possible or probable AD (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Ataxia)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis includes Ataxia (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Corticobasal Degeneration)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis includes Corticobasal Degeneration (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Control)
raw.description: Indicates if the donor was a control subject (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Dementia with Lewy Bodies/ Lewy Body Disease)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis includes Dementia with Lewy Bodies or Lewy Body Disease (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Frontotemporal lobar degeneration)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis includes Frontotemporal lobar degeneration (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Huntingtons disease)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis includes Huntington's disease (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Motor Neuron disease)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis includes Motor Neuron disease (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Multiple System Atrophy)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis includes Multiple System Atrophy (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Parkinsons disease)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis includes Parkinson's disease (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Parkinsons Cognitive Impairment - no dementia)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis includes Parkinson's Cognitive Impairment without dementia (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Parkinsons Disease Dementia)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis includes Parkinson's Disease Dementia (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Prion)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis includes Prion disease (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Progressive Supranuclear Palsy)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis includes Progressive Supranuclear Palsy (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Taupathy)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis includes Taupathy (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Vascular Dementia)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis includes Vascular Dementia (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Unknown)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis is unknown (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: Consensus Clinical Dx (choice=Other)
raw.description: Indicates if the clinical diagnosis is categorized as Other (Checked or Unchecked).

raw.name: If other Consensus dx, describe
raw.description: Text description of the diagnosis if 'Other' is checked (e.g., late onset AD, brain mets).

raw.name: Last CASI Score
raw.description: Last Cognitive Abilities Screening Instrument (CASI) score, assessing cognitive function.

raw.name: Interval from last CASI in months
raw.description: Time in months between the last CASI assessment and death.

raw.name: Last MMSE Score
raw.description: Last Mini-Mental State Examination (MMSE) score, assessing cognitive impairment.

raw.name: Interval from last MMSE in months
raw.description: Time in months between the last MMSE assessment and death.

raw.name: Last MOCA Score
raw.description: Last Montreal Cognitive Assessment (MOCA) score, assessing cognitive function.

raw.name: Interval from last MOCA in months
raw.description: Time in months between the last MOCA assessment and death.

raw.name: PMI
raw.description: Post-mortem interval, time in hours between death and tissue preservation.

raw.name: Rapid Frozen Tissue Type
raw.description: Method used for rapid freezing of tissue (e.g., Precision Slices).

raw.name: Ex Vivo Imaging
raw.description: Indicates if ex vivo imaging was performed on the brain (Yes or No).

raw.name: Fresh Brain Weight
raw.description: Weight of the fresh brain in grams.

raw.name: Brain pH
raw.description: pH level of the brain tissue post-mortem.

raw.name: Overall AD neuropathological Change
raw.description: Summary of AD neuropathological severity (Not AD, Low, Intermediate, High), based on Thal, Braak, and CERAD scores.

raw.name: Thal
raw.description: Thal phase (0-5) indicating amyloid plaque distribution.

raw.name: Braak
raw.description: Braak stage (0-VI) indicating neurofibrillary tangle distribution.

raw.name: CERAD score
raw.description: CERAD score (Absent, Sparse, Moderate, Frequent) indicating neuritic plaque density.

raw.name: Overall CAA Score
raw.description: Severity of cerebral amyloid angiopathy (e.g., Not identified, Mild, Moderate, Severe).

raw.name: Highest Lewy Body Disease
raw.description: Highest level of Lewy body pathology (e.g., Not Identified, Amygdala-predominant, Limbic, Neocortical).

raw.name: Total Microinfarcts (not observed grossly)
raw.description: Count of microinfarcts not visible macroscopically.

raw.name: Total microinfarcts in screening sections
raw.description: Count of microinfarcts observed in screening sections.

raw.name: Atherosclerosis
raw.description: Severity of atherosclerosis (e.g., Mild, Moderate, Severe).

raw.name: Arteriolosclerosis
raw.description: Severity of arteriolosclerosis (e.g., Mild, Moderate, Severe).

raw.name: LATE
raw.description: Stage of Limbic-predominant Age-related TDP-43 Encephalopathy (e.g., Not Identified, Stage 1, Stage 2, Stage 3).

raw.name: RIN
raw.description: RNA Integrity Number, indicating RNA quality of the tissue.

raw.name: Severely Affected Donor
raw.description: Indicates if the donor was severely affected by neuropathology (Y or N).

queries.question: Visualize the distribution of Braak stages across increasing ADNC categories (Not Ad, Low, Intermediate, High) as a heatmap. Save the figure as 'braak_stage_distribution_adnc_0.png' in the current folder.
